subtitleNullable: A Comprehensive Brain Tumor MRI Classification Dataset
descriptionNullable:
The dataset contains the **brain MRI images**. This dataset is the modified version of [Brain Tumor MRI Dataset](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/masoudnickparvar/brain-tumor-mri-dataset/data). Certain image processing techniques and augmentation are applied on these data.

**The image processing techniques applied on these image data includes:**

1. Converting RGB images to Grayscale images
2. Cropping Images
3. Normalizing images
4. Resizing to 256 x 256

**Cropping the images includes these steps:**

1. Applying median filter with kernal size 3x3 - Noise handling
2. Binary thresholding - Segments black region
3. Contour detection - finds contour in binary image
4. Largest contour selection
5. Bounding box calculation
6. Image cropping

**The image processing techniques applied on these image data includes:**
